AzureBlade: You are only half right. You were reborn as a decepticon. 
Before that, you were one of us.

With some of his spark's power, he activates some maximal memories of 
Nightstrike.

AzureBlade: This is the proof. These memories are yours. Do you feel 
it? Do you remember how you were called?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Nightstrike::
> 
> "I've born as Decepticon, I'm leaving as Decepticon..."roered 
> Nightstrike's spark "How can I be some else than a Decepticon?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > AzureBlade: I am here to show you who you truly are. Can you not 
> see 
> > that the one you think you are is merely a veil on your spark?
